name: Modal Share
indicator: Measure the percentage of commuters using active mobility options (walking or cycling) among the total number of commuters in the project area.

name: Number of Participants in Co-Creation Workshops
indicator: Count the total number of individuals who actively participate in co-creation workshops focused on the design and promotion of active mobility infrastructure.

name: Conflicts Removed or Mitigated
indicator: Number of conflicts that have been removed or mitigated.

name: Replicability of Bicycle Policies
indicator: The percentage of other road sections or regions where the policy of allowing bicycles in both directions can be replicated or extended.

name: Pedestrian and Cyclist Comfort Rating
indicator: Assess the comfort and satisfaction of pedestrians and cyclists in using public spaces and intersections after safety improvements.

name: Adapted Street Profiles and Reallocation of Spaces (intervention phase)
indicator: The extent of adapted street profiles and dynamically reallocated spaces to improve safety for different road users (e.g., bus lanes, cycle lanes).
unit: Unit: Length (e.g., meters), Count (e.g., number of lanes)

name: Number of Endorsements
indicator: The number of endorsements, petitions, or letters of support received from individuals and organizations endorsing the road space reallocation and the creation of safe environments near schools.

name: Feasibility of Replication
indicator: An evaluation of the feasibility and practicality of replicating the system/approach/concept in different locations.
unit: Subjective rating scale (e.g., Low, Medium, High)

name: Impact on Traffic Flows
indicator: The change in traffic flows in low-traffic areas, including reductions in vehicle columes and congestion
unit: Traffic flow parameters (e.g., vehicles per hour)

name: Accessibility and Inclusivity Index
indicator: The level of accessibility and inclusivity of the urban environment for all community members, including vulnerable groups (e.g., the elderly, people with disabilities).
unit: Index or rating (e.g., on a scale from 1 to 100)

name: Permeable Surface Conversion Area
indicator: The total area of impermeable surface that has been converted into permeable and vegetated surfaces.

name: Reduction in Motorised Transport
indicator: Reduction in the number of motorized vehicle trips or traffic volume on selected routes.
unit: Count or traffic volume metrics (e.g., vehicles per hour)

name: Reduced Car Parking Spaces
indicator: The reduction in the number of car parking spaces in the low-traffic areas after the implementation of co-created solutions.

name: Public perception of traffic conditions
indicator: The percentage of citizens and stakeholders who have a positive perception of traffic conditions after the interventions.

name: School Route Usage Rate
indicator: The percentage change in the utilization of school routes by pedestrians and cyclists after the co-design interventions.
